desc: Best humidifiers in the Philippines. Sells also water-based oil scents for humidifiers and air purifiers and freshener machines. Humi and Airoma combine for the perfect scent diffusion for fresh smelling rooms.

layout.text:
Humi Humidifiers
Excellent scent diffusers. Stylish designs.
DURING THIS ECQ PERIOD, DELIVERY IS LIMITED TO METRO MANILA ONLY.
